name: Transfer-LD48
description:
Gaze deeply into my eyes so that you might escape...

GAMEPLAY:

How far down can you go? Find the open pipe on each cycle as more and more evil spirits (orbs) appear. Getting hit by a spirit will send you back to the surface! They can be outrun by transferring into another avatar.

CONTROLS:

LMB - Click while looking at another to transfer to that avatar

E - Press E when near a pipe entrance to descend gracefully (or just let gravity do the work)
